ygData.subject: Re: Faction and Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: When running through Innothule Swamp I have been attacked by 3 NPCs. A Human Female, a Dwarf Male, and a High Elf Male. They dropped Novle Crests (no clue what
ygData.messageBody:
When running through Innothule Swamp I have been
attacked by 3 NPCs. A Human Female, a Dwarf Male, and a
High Elf Male.
They dropped Novle Crests (no clue what to do with them)
and gave me faction adjustments with their race, all
negative- duh!- but the High Elf gave me Indigo
Brotherhood faction increase.
Is there a Wood Elf that runs around the swamp too? Does
it give SK bonuses?
Also, kiling a certain type of Orc... Crushbone ones I
think, gives negative DE faction. I think a DE Guild
Leader, not sure which one said something about an
alliance with them when my wife's DE tried to get a
quest started... hence that damn Orc Runner that keeps
getting me killed in Nektulos Forrest!

More food for thought. :)

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."



>From: "Grant, Joseph" <JGrant@...>
>
>I heard there was only one way to increase faction
> with the SKs in Neriak. That is to kill the Wood Elf
> captives in Crushbone.
>
>
